Text: Since their recent restoration, the six organs in the Basilica of the Palace of Mafra have become widely known around the world.
Triplets:<the Basilica of the Palace of Mafra
1:
--------------------
Text: The six organs in the Palace of Mafra:  The six instruments - designed and built all at the same time, and designed to play together as well - were built by the two most important Portuguese organ builders of the time – António Xavier Machado e Cerveira and Joaquim António Peres Fontanes – and were completed between 1806 and 1807.
